00053 static inline void ctk_signal_read(unsigned int reg, ctk_uint32_t *data) __attribute__((always_inline)); 
00054 static inline void
00055 ctk_signal_read(unsigned int reg, ctk_uint32_t *data)
00056 {
00057     *data = spu_readch(reg);
00058 }
00059 
00071 static inline void
00072 ctk_signal_send(ea_addr_t ea_addr, ctk_uint32_t data)
00073 {
00074     volatile vector unsigned int signal_qword;
00075     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00076     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagMask, 1 << tag);
00077 
00078     /* The signall address must be at the address such like mod16 == 12 */
00079     CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(ea_addr%16 == 12);
00080 
00081 #if 0
00082     /* first empty the register */
00083     do {
00084         ctk_dma_get_block((void*)(&signal_qword) + 12, ea_addr, 4);
00085     } while (spu_extract(signal_qword, 3));
00086 #endif
00087 
00088     /* place the requested data into the LS to be DMA'ed */
00089     signal_qword = spu_promote(data, 3);
00090 
00091     spu_dsync();
00092 
00093 #if 1
00094     spu_mfcdma64((volatile void*)(((int)(&signal_qword)) + 12),
00095         ea_hi32(ea_addr), ea_lo32(ea_addr), 4, tag, MFC_SNDSIGB_CMD);
00096 #else
00097     mfc_sndsig((volatile void*)(((int)(&signal_qword)) + 12),
00098         ea_addr, tag, 0, 0);
00099 #endif
00100 
00101     ctk_eieio(tag);
00102 
00103     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagUpdate, MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ALL);
00104     spu_readch(MFC_RdTagStat);
00105 }

00143 ctk_signal_read_count(unsigned int reg)
